item.title: About This Blog
item.description: Hi there! I am a Ph.D. candidate in strategic management @ the University of California, Riverside. My research concerns the interplay between strategy and the categorical/social structure of the market. Using machine learning in strategy thinking is fun. As we envision how things connect, our minds naturally turn to what makes them tick.
